root: ^You discover a note left by your mentor.
^My dear apprentice, I'm so glad you have discovered the note I left for you.
^As I write this message, I am about to be captured by the Draconic cult.
^I am sure they have taken me to their secret lair by the time you are reading this.
^In order to defeat them, you must collect the Ray of Icarus, the ultimate weapon capable of defeating them.
^I wish you luck on your journey. The world is counting on you.
